name: 99 Unedrground
description:
A very small and rushed prototyper for wild game Jam. 
I had no experience on working with tiles and especially making them destroyable.

Try to climb from the under 99 levels underground. Collect sources and use and place them to help you to climb. Use the truffle power to destroy the envoirement

INSTRUCTIONS:

AD - Move around the world
WS- Move vertically the camera
RightMouse pressed - Place Cube of dirt/ Use Truffle Power 
Left Mouse - Punch
Mouse Wheel - Change item
